description: Day trip to Nikko - UNESCO World Heritage temples and beautiful nature.

activities.description: Travel to Nikko: Limited Express from Asakusa to Tobu-Nikko Station
Lunch in Nikko - traditional Buddhist vegetarian cuisine
Explore Nikko National Park and Kegon Falls
Travel back to Tokyo: Limited Express to Asakusa

meals: Lunch: Nikko local cuisine, Dinner: Tokyo
notes: Nikko is beautiful in autumn/winter. Bring warm clothes for the mountains.
